description:
I downloaded DASH a few days ago, but I didn't care for it and uninstalled it.
The uninstall generated many errors, and; after it, I could not read or write to my terminal. This never happened to me before.  When I rebooted, the system would not come up and I had to use the (Ubuntu Inspiron 3847) system emergency reboot.
I have had to reinstall everything and regret using DASH.  I still haven't recovered use of thunderbird email, because it keeps telling me to enter a password, but none of my old passwords works.  I am using Google to email this.
summary: Probably Includes a Virus or Worm
